mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS questionid,b.id AS replyid,b.repContent,b.repDatetime,b.state,b.userId,a.queTitle FROM question_tab a LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM reply_tab GROUP BY questionid) b ON a.id = b.questionId WHERE a.status="1" ORDER BY b.repDatetime DESC,a.releaseDate
select * from question_tab where id=#{id} order by releaseDate desc
select * from reply_tab where questionId = #{id} order by repDatetime desc
